questions.instructions: Complete the sentences with the correct word.

qa_pairs.item:
¹I usually __________ my teeth after breakfast. (brush / read / walk)
²Look! She’s __________ a picture. (drawing / listening / playing)
³They __________ to school by bus every day. (go / eat / help)
⁴Please __________ me with the dishes. (help / sit / show)
⁵We are __________ a new book in class. (reading / cleaning / eating)
⁶He __________ to music every evening. (listens / sees / paints)
⁷I can’t __________ my phone. (find / do / speak)
⁸Let’s __________ football after lunch. (play / try / drink)
qa_pairs.answer: ¹brush, ²drawing, ³go, ⁴help, ⁵reading, ⁶listens, ⁷find, ⁸play

questions.instructions: Complete the sentences with the correct word.

⁵Look! The baby is __________. (crying / running / reading)
⁶We usually __________ soccer at the park. (play / look / call)
⁷Can you __________ the door? (close / draw / start)
⁸She is __________ a red dress today. (wearing / taking / driving)
qa_pairs.answer: ¹have, ²writing, ³open, ⁴sleeps, ⁵crying, ⁶play, ⁷close, ⁸wearing
